contents.text: Thank you for calling Samsara, the new data platform for the physical world, headquartered in San Francisco.
For sales and product information, press 1.
To speak with a sales specialist, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales specialist.

navigationGoals: I need information on advanced analytics features from a sales specialist.
I need to speak with a sales specialist about purchasing Samsara for my veteran-owned logistics company.
I need to talk to a sales specialist about enterprise-scale API integration and licensing options.
I want to speak with someone about buying the right Samsara sensors for my needs.
I need to speak with a sales specialist about purchasing Samsara sensors for my physics lab setup.

contents.text: To request a product demo or pricing, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our demo team.

navigationGoals: I want to schedule a live demo and get pricing for 50 IoT sensors.
I’d like to schedule a product demo and get pricing details for deploying Samsara across my small fleet.
I want to schedule a product demo covering sensor network analytics and get detailed pricing tiers.
I’d like to schedule a demo of the platform and get pricing information.
I’d like to schedule a product demo and get pricing for using Samsara to collect experimental data.

contents.text: For technical support and customer service, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Help troubleshoot a connectivity issue with an offline device.
I’m having trouble connecting my vehicle sensors to the Samsara platform and need technical assistance.
I’m experiencing connectivity issues with the Samsara API endpoint and need to troubleshoot with technical support.
I’m having trouble with my sensor connecting and need technical help.
I’m having trouble connecting my sensors and uploading readings—need technical support.

contents.text: For training and consulting services, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our customer success team.

navigationGoals: I want to discuss professional training and implementation consulting.
I want to set up training and consulting services to learn how to use Samsara’s analytics for my fleet operations.
I’d like to arrange a consulting session for advanced analytics training and system onboarding best practices.
I need information on training sessions so I can learn to use the Samsara system.
I want information on training and consulting services to integrate Samsara into my research workflow.
